word: To Moses, Jehovah declared, "I AM THAT I AM" (Exodus 3:14). Christ declared, "Before Abraham was, I am" (John 8:58). By this declaration He laid open the resources of His infinite nature, imparting in His words assurance of pardon for the guilty race. He is the Word, conscious of power that He can take up and lay down His life as He chooses [in order] to secure the salvation of those who have fallen under Satan's falsehoods and intrigues. . . .
